feed.title: Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:46 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 11:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening then changing to snow near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few rain showers and flurries beginning near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
